import './CheckoutScreen.css' import {useState} from 'react' function Checkout(){ const [name, setName] = useState('') const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [phone, setPhone] = useState('') const [street, setStreet] = useState('') const [number, setNumber] = useState('') const [zipCode, setZipCode] = useState('') const [city, setCity] = useState('') const [cardHolder, setCardHolder] = useState('') const [cardNumber, setCardNumber] = useState('') const [expiry, setExpiry] = useState(new Date()) const [cvv, setCvv] = useState('') return(
) } export default Checkout
